goal.en: This is a course devoted to developing students’ Business English skills of listening and speaking. In class, by taking class activities, such as listening and note taking, group discussion, oral presentation, and vocabulary building, students have the opportunities to express their opinions and interact with each other in the target language. The topics selected from Market Leader: Intermediate Business English Course Book(3rd Edition Extra) can be of interest to students, and the case studies in the book are strongly linked to the business topics of each unit. Other timely, authentic and insightful materials chosen from different sources will be selected to provide opportunities for discussions and personalized practices in class. Both of which will promote the development of the linguistic and communication skills which students need to succeed in business.
